org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xbox360

Class WindowsXbox360Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.Xbox360Controller
      • org.mini2Dx.core.controller.xbox360.WindowsXbox360Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.controllers.ControllerListener, MdxController<Xbox360ControllerListener>

    public class WindowsXbox360Controller
extends Xbox360Controller
    Windows bindings for Xbox 360 controller
